lead_paragraph: From Floyd Norris on Notions of High and Low Finance:
snippet: It is getting lonely to be a man who thinks that there is no double-dip recession coming. But Floyd Norris still thinks the recovery is going to pick up steam, not lose it.
abstract: It is getting lonely to be a man who thinks that there is no double-dip recession coming. But Floyd Norris still thinks the recovery is going to pick up steam, not lose it.
